Please choose guide voice engine: Select your height unit Select your weight unit Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday Friday Saturday Sunday Mute Voice Guide Coach tips OK Set Cancel Gender Date Of Birth Female Male 7x4 Challenge Push-up Level Pump up your shoulders with two dumbbells Build Wider Shoulders Go! Fully exercising the deltoid muscles can effectively widen your shoulders. Focus on the middle deltoid; fully stimulate it with weights to increase the width of your shoulders. Exercise your front and rear deltoids in isolation to make your shoulders rounder and bigger.

This workout plan targets the three distinct parts of your deltoids. Combined with some compound shoulder exercises, it can build muscles and greatly pump up your shoulders!

Suggestions for dumbbells:

- 2.5-5kg for beginner
- 5-10kg for intermediate
- 10-15kg for advanced. To get wider shoulders, you need to focus on exercising your front, middle and rear deltoids in isolation. It requires good control of your target muscles` contraction.\n This workout plan fully activates your shoulders from all angles, helping you feel the engagement of every single muscle. Fully exercising the deltoid muscles can effectively widen your shoulders. Focus on the middle deltoid; fully stimulate it with weights to increase the width of your shoulders. Exercise your front and rear deltoids in isolation to make your shoulders rounder and bigger.
